verses.roman:
svarūpa-gosāñi tabe sṛjilā prakāra
kadalīra śuṣka-patra ānilā apāra

synonyms: svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; tabe—thereafter; sṛjilā prakāra—devised a means; kadalīra—of banana; śuṣka-patra—dry leaves; ānilā—brought; apāra—in great quantity.
translation: Then Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī devised another method. First he secured a large quantity of dry banana leaves.
